description: Find the sum of a geometric progression series given the first term (a), number of terms (n), and common ratio (r). The sum is calculated using the formula: a*(r**n - 1)//(r - 1) when r != 1.
input_format: Three integers a, n, r separated by spaces on a single line.
output_format: A single integer representing the sum of the geometric progression.
prompt:
; Find the sum of a geometric progression series given the first term (a), number of terms (n), and common ratio (r). The sum is calculated using the formula: a*(r**n - 1)//(r - 1) when r != 1.
; Input format: Three integers a, n, r separated by spaces on a single line.
; Output format: A single integer representing the sum of the geometric progression.

#lang racket
completions:
(define (sum-geometric a n r)
  (if (= r 1)
      (* a n)
      (/ (- (* a (expt r n)) 1) (- r 1))))

; Example usage:
; (sum-geometric 2 3 3) ; Output: 20
; (sum-geometric 1 5 2) ; Output: 31
